Posts.Content: Bernmomof3 wrote: So I went to the gyno because I found a lump and when I got there, she found another lump. So, needless to say I have to go for 3D diagnostic mamo and ultrasound of each breast tomorrow. My question for you...how big was yours? Where was yours at? And did you have more than one? Did it run in your family? Tomorrow will they biopsy right there Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Very scared Bernmomof3 bevin
